name: repo-md

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:lib && npm run build:cli && node npm/copy-to-dist.js
scripts.build:demo: cd src/demo && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.prepare-npm: npm run build && echo 'The dist folder is now ready for publishing'
scripts.prepublish-checks: npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.publish-npm: npm run build-npm && cd dist && npm publish && cd.. && npm run version-bump-patch
scripts.npm-whoami: npm whoami || echo 'Not logged in to npm'
scripts.version-bump-patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && cd npm && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && cd ..
scripts.version-bump-minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && cd npm && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && cd ..
scripts.version-bump-major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && cd npm && npm version major --no-git-tag-version && cd ..

description: API client for consuming content from your repo.md projects
author: repo.md
